name: map_to_base
description: Maps an image or surface from a time point directory (either cross-sectional or longitudinal) to the base space and outputs it in the appropriate base directory.

inputs.description: Identifier of the time point, without the '.long.baseid' suffix.
inputs.name: Time Point ID

inputs.description: Input image, e.g., norm.mgz, aseg.mgz, lh.white.
inputs.name: Input Image

inputs.description: Resample type. 'interpolate' for norm, T1, orig; 'nearest' for aseg; 'surface' for surfaces.
inputs.name: Resample Type

inputs.description: If '1', input is from cross sectionals; default is to use longitudinal directories.
inputs.name: Cross Sectional Flag

output-files.description: Output in base/mri directory when mapped from a longitudinal directory.
output-files.name: Output Longitudinal MRI

output-files.description: Output in base/surf directory when mapped from a longitudinal directory.
output-files.name: Output Longitudinal Surface

output-files.description: Output in base/mri directory when mapped from a cross-sectional directory.
output-files.name: Output Cross-sectional MRI

output-files.description: Output in base/surf directory when mapped from a cross-sectional directory.
output-files.name: Output Cross-sectional Surface

author: FreeSurfer Developers
